info.narration: [ {"$0" waited quietly, showing no intention to attack.}, {"My dear, may you have sweet dreams on my web."}, ]
[ {"$0"'s eight eyes looked at #0 gently, revealing a kind of motherly love.}, {If the dream is so beautiful, why bother waking up?}, ]
[ {#0 smelled the strange aroma emitted by the spider web, which made them feel drowsy.}, {Those who covet the beauty of the moment will be trapped in that gentle cobweb forever.}, ]

collection.name: Dreamcatcher
collection.openText: Come here, lie on my net, and have a good sleep

observe.desc:
[ {The following reports illustrate the hidden dangers of this abnormality. Judging from the conclusion alone, we should give up planning activities that rely on it to alleviate the mental state of employees. Managers in each department are asked to carefully review the audio file and its attachments:
<Audio Recording KM-2426> Psychological counselor: Do you feel any discomfort now? Kenny: What's wrong? I feel very good now. It is the mildest abnormality I have ever encountered. Although it looks a little scary, as long as you really talk to it, you will find the difference between it and those monsters. Psychological Counselor: Do you still remember what you did in the holding unit? Kenny: Of course, I talked to it about a lot of things, mostly me saying that it was listening. Then I seemed a little sleepy, so it invited me to lie down on the net and sleep. You know, I was also panicked at the time, but After I woke up, it still looked at me tenderly, you know? That was simply the most peaceful dream I've had in weeks. Psychological counselor: Do you still remember what dreams you had? Kenny: I remember...it was like...Sorry, I can't remember. Psychological counselor: It doesn’t matter. If you feel something is wrong later, remember to report it for examination as soon as possible. Kenny: Okay, I hope we won’t meet again. Every time I see you being so serious, I get scared...
"Give yourself more sunshine. You don't have to cater to others all the time." } ]

[ {<Audio Recording KM-2435> Psychological counselor: It seems that your recent work status is not very good. Kenny: Yes? Sorry, I've been a little absent-minded recently, maybe due to some mental pollution. Psychological Counselor: According to the shift order, it seems that you have been working on "T-02-676" a bit frequently this week? Kenny: I'm sorry, but you should understand that compared to those abnormal objects that may kill you at any time, it is simply mild and ridiculous. I remember that besides me, there are many employees rushing to work on it. . Psychological counselor: I noticed that you have been yawning since you entered the door. Are you having trouble sleeping? Kenny: It's a little bit. I've been drinking a lot of coffee recently and haven't slept very well these days. That's why I applied for work on "T-02-676" many times, right? I want to treat my insomnia. Psychological counselor: If you just have insomnia, I can provide you with more effective solutions. Kenny: If you're asking me to work on that intelligence sheep... Psychological counselor: Employees are precious assets within the company. How can I let you do such risky things? I have a few bottles of medicine here. You should drink less coffee and don't touch alcohol anymore...
"Don't worry, I will always be with you, so don't give up on yourself anymore, okay?"} ]

[ {<Audio Recording KM-2443> Kenny: I always feel...something's wrong... Psychologist: Are you okay? Kenny: I'm...ok...of course I'm fine...I'm just...a little sleepy... Psychological Counselor: Have you had a good rest? You look a lot thinner than before. The data shows that your working time on that spider is much longer than that of other Abnormalities... Kenny: So sleepy... I want to sleep... I want to dream... Counselor: Are you listening? Kenny: Let me sleep...let me sleep! Let me sleep!!
The employee suddenly got violent and attacked the psychological counselor and smashed the monitor. It was found that his mental state was very fragile and his health level declined exponentially.
"Come here, lie on my net, and have a good sleep."} ]

specialTipSize.specialTip: "$0" will consume corresponding levels of sanity when the employee leaves the containment unit based on the work results.
If the amount of sanity consumed by "$0" reaches the threshold, its Qliphoth counter will be increased.
Employees whose fortitude level is lower than level 4 will lie on the Internet uncontrollably after entering the containment unit of "$0". Then "$0" will fall down and start eating the employee.
When "$0"'s Qliphoth counter reaches its max value, its Qliphoth counter will immediately reset to zero, subsequently attracting certain employees to its containment unit for a delicious meal.
When "$0"'s Qliphoth counter reaches zero, every employee who steps into its containment unit will be seduced by the soft spider silk, lying on the web and allowed to be eaten by "$0".
